SectionBody.Text: The Northwood Shared Resource Center is an agency established within the Department of Management Services for administrative purposes only.

Subsection.Text: The center is a primary data center and is a separate budget entity that is not subject to control, supervision, or direction of the department in any manner, including, but not limited to, purchasing, transactions involving real or personal property, personnel, or budgetary matters.

The center shall be headed by a board of trustees as provided in s. 282.203, who shall comply with all requirements of that section related to the operation of the center and with the rules of the Agency for Enterprise Information Technology related to the design and delivery of enterprise information technology services.
